attributes.action: A full Parliamentary Debate to consider if the Chancellor misled Parliament
attributes.additional_details: I want Parliament to debate this issue because there is totally conflicting and confusing information currently circulating on all media at present. That information requires full and public investigation to prove or disprove to the satisfaction of the UK electorate whether the information provided by the government is fully truthful or not.
attributes.background: To debate the full evidence, timing, dates and accurate financial status of all aspects relating to the Chancellor declaring the existence of a Black Hole in the UK economy, commencing from her installation as Chancellor until the present time. This petition requested in light of recent OBR report.

rejection.details:
There was a debate on an Opposition Day in the Chamber of the House of Commons on Wednesday 10 December on this very subject.

https://commonsbusiness.parliament.uk/Document/100101/Html?subType=Standard#20251210-14
